Summary: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, and his husband Oliver Mulherin, have signed the Giving Pledge, a commitment to donate the majority of their wealth to philanthropy. The couple intends to focus their donations on technology that helps create abundance for people. Altman, a prominent figure in the technology industry, has amassed his wealth through venture capital funds and investments in various startups, having already invested in over 125 companies. His most significant investment was approximately $375 million in the nuclear fusion company, Helion Energy. Altman has gained attention due to the rapid growth of OpenAI since the launch of ChatGPT. The company was valued at around $80 billion in February 2022, and Altman personally invested about $13 billion in OpenAI before Microsoft closed a deal with Helion Energy in May 2023.
